text: stature 50% Skeletal muscle atrophy 50% Abnormality of the aortic valve 7.5% Cataract 7.5% Cranial nerve paralysis 7.5% Diabetes mellitus 7.5% Incoordination 7.5% Nystagmus 7.5% Opacification of the corneal stroma 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percen
